name: Fear the Beast
description:
You and the Red Hood stuck in a dark forest for the night. There is only one thing, which can help you survive amongst wolves ... The light!

You are in the forest. In order to survive this night you have to collect the wood and keep up the fire in camp with F button. Also you have a torch and while it burns, it scares the hungry wolves. You can light the torch with E. You need to stay alive until dawn (4:30AM). Good luck.

We have created this game for Ludum Dare 46. This is a second jam for our team, and the second game we created.
